channel.title: Bigupradio.com DEADLY MIX RADIO Show
channel.description: Lonestar Sound Is About Blazing The Western Frontier Of Reggae Music. Lonestar Is In Response To Eastern 'stereotypes' Of What The Reggae Scene Is Like On The West Coast. Reggae Music Is Not Just Bob Marley...It Is The Voice Of The Ghetto...It Is Sizzla, Vybz Kartel+ Many More. It Is Culture It Is Dancehall...It Is Lonestarsound, "The Baddest Sound Around Town!" Lonestar Sound consists of DJ UNI-T, DADDY ROLO, MARSMOOVE and MENDOJA. Tune in every Friday after the ALLSPICE Show!
channel.itunes:author: bigupradio.com
channel.itunes:summary: ATTENTION APPLE - ITUNES: THIS PODCAST IS LEGAL. ANY QUESTIONS PLEASE EMAIL INFO@BIGUPRADIO.COM. Lonestar Sound Is About Blazing The Western Frontier Of Reggae Music. Lonestar resides On The West Coast.
channel.itunes:subtitle: DEADLY MIX RADIO Show with hosts LONESTAR SOUND

item.title: DEADLY MIX RADIO #78
item.description: Bigupradio.com proudly presents DEADLY MIX RADIO with hosts LONESTAR SOUND of San Francisco. Be careful, these remixes are deadly! Lonestar Sound consists of DJ Uni-T, Daddy Rolo, Mendoja and Marsmoov. This show is Blazing Hot featuring all the latest grooves on the remix side. Tune in every Friday after the ALLSPICE Reggae Show. ONE LOVE
